Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Kodi Ife sitidatsegule chifuwa chako
Ndi kukuchotsa katundu wako wolemera
Amene amalemetsa msana wako
Ndipo tidakweza mbiri yako yabwino
Ndithudi m’mavuto muli chithandizo
Ndithudi m’mavuto muli chithandizo
Ndipo pamene wamaliza, pembedza Mulungu
Ndipo dzipereke kwathunthu kwa Ambuye wako
Pali mtengo wa mkuyu ndi mtengo wa azitona
Ndi pali phiri la Sinai
Ndi pali Mzinda uwu wa mtendere
Ndithudi Ife tidamulenga munthu m’chikombole chabwino
Ndipo tinamutsitsa kukhala wapansi zedi
Kupatula amene amakhulupirira ndipo amachita ntchito zabwino, iwo adzalandira mphotho yosatha
Kodi ndi chiyani, chimene chili kukupangitsani kukana tsiku la chiweruzo
Kodi Mulungu si woweruza wabwino kuposa oweruza onse
Werenga! M’dzina la Ambuye wako amene analenga
Yemwe adalenga munthu kuchokera ku kadontho kamagazi oundana
werenga! Ndipo Ambuye wako ndiye wopereka mowoolowa manja
Amene anaphunzitsa ndi cholembera
Anaphunzitsa munthu chimene sanali kuchidziwa
Iyayi! Ndithudi, munthu amalakwa mopyola muyeso
Chifukwa amaganiza kuti iye ndi oima payekha
Ndithudi! Nonse mudzabwerera kwa Ambuye wanu
Kodi mwamuona munthu amene amaletsa
Kapolo pamene akupemphera
Kodi mwamuona ngati iye alikutsatira chilangizo chabwino
Kapena kulamulira machitidwe abwino
Ndiuze ngati iye akana choonadi ndipo salabadira
Kodi iye sadziwa kuti Mulungu amaona zinthu zonse
Iyayi! Ngati iye sasiya, Ife tidzamududuluza pogwira tsitsi la pa mphumi pake
Mphumi yabodza ndi yochimwa
Ndipo mulekeni iye aitane anzake oti amuthandize
Ife tidzaitana osunga Gahena
Iyayi! Usamumvere iye. Gunditsa mphumi yako pansi ndipo idza pafupi ndi Mulungu
Ndithudi tinavumbulutsa ilo mu usiku wamphamvu
Kodi ndi chiyani chimene chingakuuzeni kuti mudziwe kuti usiku wamphamvu ndi otani
Usiku wamphamvu ndi wabwino kuposa miyezi chikwi chimodzi
Mu usiku umenewu Angelo ndi Mzimu, ndi chilolezo cha Mulungu, amachoka kumwamba ndi kutsika pansi ndi malamulo ake onse
Mtendere mpaka m’mbandakucha
Iwo amene sakhulupirira a m’gulu la anthu a m’Buku ndi anthu opembedza mafano, sadzasiya kusakhulupilira mpaka pamene zizindikiro zooneka zitaperekedwa kwa iwo
Mtumwi wochokera kwa Mulungu amene ali kuwerenga kuchokera pa Masamba oyera
Amene ali ndi malamulo angwiro ndi omveka bwino ochokera kwa Mulungu
Ndipo anthu okhulupirira Buku sanayambe kugawikana pakati pawo mpaka pamene zizindikiro zooneka zidaperekedwa kwa iwo

Ndipo Al-Zalzala	659 iwo sadalamulidwe koma kuti azipembedza Mulungu ndipo kuti asapembedze wina aliyense koma Iye yekha ndipo kuti adzipemphera pa nthawi yake ndi kupereka msonkho wothandiza anthu osauka. Ndipo chimenechi ndicho chipembedzo chabwino
Ndithudi iwo amene sakhulupirira amene ali pakati pa anthu a m’Buku, ndi anthu opembedza mafano, adzakhala ku moto wa ku Gahena. Iwo ndiwo oipa zedi pa zolengedwa zonse
Ndithudi iwo amene atsatira chikhulupiriro choonadi ndipo amachita ntchito zabwino ndiwo olemekezeka pa zolengedwa zonse

Mphotho yawo imene ili ndi Ambuye wawo ndi kuwaika m’minda imene imathiriridwa ndi madzi ya m’mitsinje pansi pake, kumene adzakhalako nthawi zonse. Mulungu ndi wosangalala ndi iwo ndipo nawonso ndi osangalala ndi Iye. M’menemo ndi m’mene munthu oopa Mulungu adzalandirire mphotho yake
Pamene dziko lidzagwedezeka ndi chivomerezi chomaliza
Ndipo pamene nthaka idzatulutsa katundu amene ali m’kati mwake
Ndipo munthu adzafunsa: “Kodi yatani?”
Pa tsikuli nthaka idzaulula zonse
Chifukwa Ambuye wako wayiuza kuti itero
Pa tsikuli mtundu wa anthu udzadza m’magulu osiyana siyana kudzalangizidwa ntchito zawo
Motero aliyense amene amachita chabwino cholemera ngati njere ya mpiru, adzachiona
Ndipo aliyense amene amachita choipa cholemera ngati njere ya mpiru, adzachiona
Palizothamangakwambirindikupumakwawokofulumira
Ndi zimene zimaonetsa moto zikamathamanga
Ndipo zimachita nkhondo m’mbandakucha
Ndi kuonetsa fumbi
Ndi kuphwanya pakati gulu la adani
Ndithudi! Munthu sathokoza kwaAmbuye wake
Ndipo mwini wake amachitira umboni zimenezi
Ndithudi iye ali kukonda chuma kwambiri
